wrapper.wrapperContent:
AEGIS DEMO

Create Job

Test the Aegis plugin to save a Job.

Aegis plugin is required to save a job.

Go

Load Job

Load a predefined Job.

Aegis plugin is required to save a job.

Go

Aegis Plugin

Install the Aegis plugin.

Install

Job Preview

View last job's execution.

View

Unit Tests

Run the Unit Tests.

Aegis plugin is required to run the unit tests.

For security reasons, please copy and paste the link to the url bar to execute the test.

chrome://aegis/content/aegis/test.html
